package.name: ycb
package.description:
This incorporates a subset of the YCB Models, using mesh files from `RobotLocomotion/models`.
For more information, please see the `ycb README` in the in the `models` repository: https://github.com/RobotLocomotion/models/tree/master/ycb.
package.author: Drake Users

export.deprecated: The 'package://ycb' URI spelling is deprecated, and will be removed from Drake on or around 2022-03-01. Please spell the URI as 'package://drake/manipulation/models/ycb' instead.
